languages.text: "Попадая в культ, мы отрекаемся от прошлого. И обретаем новых братьев и сестер. Я видела ужас, и боль, и сомнения в глазах тех, кому Неумирающий прошептал знакомые имена. Для некоторых... Забвение является благом, сравнимым с даром смерти".

"When we join the cult, we relinquish our past. The Bloodspun Web becomes our new family. I have seen the pain, terror, and doubt in the eyes of those who hear the Undying One whisper the names of their kin. For some... the blessing of oblivion is a gift not unlike death."
languages.original_text: "Попадая в культ, мы отрекаемся от прошлого. И обретаем новых братьев и сестер. Я видела ужас, и боль, и сомнения в глазах тех, кому Неумирающий прошептал знакомые имена. Для некоторых... Забвение является благом, сравнимым с даром смерти".

traits.locale_text: "When we join the cult, we relinquish our past. We find new brothers and sisters. I have seen the terror, pain, and doubt in the eyes of those who heard the Undying One whisper familiar names to them. For some... oblivion is a blessing not unlike the gift of death."

"When we join the cult, we relinquish our past. We find new brothers and sisters. I have seen the terror, pain, and doubt in the eyes of those who heard the Undying One whisper familiar names to them. For some... oblivion is a blessing not unlike the gift of death."

"When we join the cult, we relinquish our past. The Bloodspun Web becomes our new family. I have seen the pain, terror, and doubt in the eyes of those who hear the Undying One whisper the names of their kin. For some... the blessing of oblivion is a gift not unlike death."

languages.text: «Cuando nos unimos al culto, renunciamos a nuestro pasado. La Red Sanguinolenta se convierte en nuestra nueva familia. He contemplado el dolor, el terror y la duda en los ojos de quienes oyen al Inmortal susurrar los nombres de sus antiguos parientes. Para algunos... la bendición del olvido es un don equiparable a la muerte».
languages.original_text: "When we join the cult, we relinquish our past. The Bloodspun Web becomes our new family. I have seen the pain, terror, and doubt in the eyes of those who hear the Undying One whisper the names of their kin. For some... the blessing of oblivion is a gift not unlike death."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando nos unimos al culto, renunciamos a nuestro pasado. La Red Sanguinolenta se convierte en nuestra nueva familia. He contemplado el dolor, el terror y la duda en los ojos de quienes oyen al Inmortal susurrar los nombres de sus antiguos parientes. Para algunos... la bendición del olvido es un don equiparable a la muerte».

languages.text: 「教団に入る際に、私たちは過去を手放すの。ブラッドスパン・ウェブが新たな家族になる。不死の者が親族の名を囁くのを聞く者たちの目に、苦痛が、恐怖が、疑念が宿るのを見てきたわ。一部の者にとっては…忘却の祝福は、死と変わらない贈り物でもある」
languages.original_text: "When we join the cult, we relinquish our past. The Bloodspun Web becomes our new family. I have seen the pain, terror, and doubt in the eyes of those who hear the Undying One whisper the names of their kin. For some... the blessing of oblivion is a gift not unlike death."

traits.locale_text: 「教団に入る際に、私たちは過去を手放すの。ブラッドスパン・ウェブが新たな家族になる。不死の者が親族の名を囁くのを聞く者たちの目に、苦痛が、恐怖が、疑念が宿るのを見てきたわ。一部の者にとっては…忘却の祝福は、死と変わらない贈り物でもある」

languages.text: “当我们加入教派的那一刻起，我们就放弃了过去，织血罗网成为了我们新的家庭。我曾见过那样的人，当他们听到自己亲人的名字被不死之神呼唤时，他们眼中充满了痛苦、恐惧和怀疑。对于一部分人而言……遗忘与死亡一样，都是弥足珍贵的祝福。”
languages.original_text: "When we join the cult, we relinquish our past. The Bloodspun Web becomes our new family. I have seen the pain, terror, and doubt in the eyes of those who hear the Undying One whisper the names of their kin. For some... the blessing of oblivion is a gift not unlike death."

traits.locale_text: “当我们加入教派的那一刻起，我们就放弃了过去，织血罗网成为了我们新的家庭。我曾见过那样的人，当他们听到自己亲人的名字被不死之神呼唤时，他们眼中充满了痛苦、恐惧和怀疑。对于一部分人而言……遗忘与死亡一样，都是弥足珍贵的祝福。”

languages.text: "Wenn wir dem Kult beitreten, geben wir unsere Vergangenheit auf. Das Blutgesponnene Netz wird zu unserer neuen Familie. Ich habe den Schmerz, die Angst und Zweifel in den Augen jener gesehen, die hören, wenn der Todlose die Namen der Ihren flüstert. Für manche ... ähnelt das Geschenk des Vergessens durchaus dem Tod."
languages.original_text: "When we join the cult, we relinquish our past. The Bloodspun Web becomes our new family. I have seen the pain, terror, and doubt in the eyes of those who hear the Undying One whisper the names of their kin. For some... the blessing of oblivion is a gift not unlike death."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn wir dem Kult beitreten, geben wir unsere Vergangenheit auf. Das Blutgesponnene Netz wird zu unserer neuen Familie. Ich habe den Schmerz, die Angst und Zweifel in den Augen jener gesehen, die hören, wenn der Todlose die Namen der Ihren flüstert. Für manche ... ähnelt das Geschenk des Vergessens durchaus dem Tod."

languages.text: « Quand nous rejoignons le culte, nous renonçons à notre passé. La Toile de Sang devient notre nouvelle famille. J'ai vu la souffrance, la terreur et le doute dans les yeux de ceux qui entendent l'Immortel souffler le nom de leurs proches. Pour certains... la bénédiction de l'oubli est un don similaire à celui de la mort. »
languages.original_text: "When we join the cult, we relinquish our past. The Bloodspun Web becomes our new family. I have seen the pain, terror, and doubt in the eyes of those who hear the Undying One whisper the names of their kin. For some... the blessing of oblivion is a gift not unlike death."

Pour certains... la bénédiction de l'oubli est un don similaire à celui de la mort. »

languages.text: "Tarikata katıldığımızda geçmişimizden feragat ederiz. Yeni ailemiz, Kanipi Ağı olur. Ölmeyen'in aile fertlerinin adını fısıldadığı kişilerin gözlerindeki acı, dehşet ve kuşkuya tanık oldum. Unutmak, kimisi için bir armağandır... Tıpkı ölüm gibi."
languages.original_text: "When we join the cult, we relinquish our past. The Bloodspun Web becomes our new family. I have seen the pain, terror, and doubt in the eyes of those who hear the Undying One whisper the names of their kin. For some... the blessing of oblivion is a gift not unlike death."
